Sec. 2-8.2.5. Aviation Department procurement.
Notwithstanding the provisions of Sections,, and, the County Manager or his designee is authorized to advertise any proposed contract to be administered by the Aviation Department without prior approval of the Board, upon the County Manager's recommendation of the contract measures applicable to such contract. The Board's approval of the award or its ratification of such contract shall constitute the Board's approval of such contract measures previously recommended by the County Manager.
